fields.name: ACEID [-]
fields.title: ACE sample ID
fields.description: Project specific sample identifier [-]

fields.name: ACEID_SALNTY [-]
fields.title: ACE salinity sample ID
fields.description: Project specific salinity sample identifier [-]

fields.name: LEG [-]
fields.title: ACE leg number
fields.description: Leg number of ACE expedition [1-3]

fields.name: STNNBR [-]
fields.title: ACE station number
fields.description: Station number at which sample was collected or instrument from which it was collected, was deployed [-]

fields.name: CASTNO [-]
fields.title: Instrument cast number
fields.description: CTD cast number from which sample was collected [-]

fields.name: SAMPNO [-]
fields.title: Project sample number
fields.description: Project specific sample number [-]

fields.name: BTLNBR [-]
fields.title: Bottle number
fields.description: Niskin bottle number or underway (UW) [-]

fields.name: ACEID_EVENT [-]
fields.title: ACE event number
fields.description: ACE event number [-]

fields.name: DATETIME [YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss+00:00]
fields.title: Sampling date and time
fields.description: Date and time at which sample was collected [UTC]

fields.name: LATITUDE [DEG_N]
fields.title: Sampling latitude
fields.description: Latitude of vessel when sample was collected [decimal degree North]
fields.x_spi_cf_attribute: Latitude of vessel when sample was collected

fields.name: LONGITUDE [DEG_E]
fields.title: Sampling longitude
fields.description: Longitude of vessel when sample was collected [decimal degree East]
fields.x_spi_cf_attribute: Longitude of vessel when sample was collected

fields.name: SAMPDPTH [M]
fields.title: Sampling depth
fields.description: Approximate sample collection depth below sea level [meter]
fields.x_spi_cf_attribute: Approximate sample collection depth below sea level

fields.name: PRS [DBAR]
fields.title: Pressure
fields.description: Pressure inferred from sampling depth relative to atmospheric standard pressure 1013.25 mbar [decibars]
fields.x_spi_cf_attribute: Pressure inferred from sampling depth relative to atmospheric standard pressure 1013.25 mbar

fields.name: CTDTMP [ITS-90]
fields.title: Seawater temperature measured by CTD
fields.description: Seawater temperature measured by CTD sensor (cast or thermosalinograph) [International Temperature Scale 1990]

fields.name: CTDSAL [PSS-78]
fields.title: Seawater salinity measured by CTD
fields.description: Seawater salinity measured by CTD sensor (cast or thermosalinograph) [Practical Salinity Scale 1978]

fields.name: SALNTY [PSS-78]
fields.title: Seawater salinity
fields.description: Seawater salinity [Practical Salinity Scale 78]

fields.name: SALNTYERR [PSS-78]
fields.title: Estimated error in SALNTY
fields.description: Estimated measurement error in SALNTY (does not account for sampling error) [Practical Salinity Scale 78]

fields.name: SALNTY_FLAG_W [-]
fields.title: SALNTY quality flag
fields.description: Quality flag associated with SALNTY [1-9]

fields.name: SAL_DIFF_CTD [PSS-78]
fields.title: Difference in seawater salinity
fields.description: Difference in seawater salinity: sample minus CTD sensor (cast or thermosalinograph) [Practical Salinity Scale 1978]

fields.name: BTL_DATETIME [YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss+00:00]
fields.title: Date and time bottle fired
fields.description: Niskin bottle closing date and time [UTC]

fields.name: BTL_LAT [DEG_N]
fields.title: Latitude bottle fired
fields.description: Niskin bottle closing latitude [decimal degree North]

fields.name: BTL_LON [DEG_E]
fields.title: Longitude bottle fired
fields.description: Niskin bottle closing longitude [decimal degree East]
